parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the position of the given camera or seagull (see [[camCreate]]). It is worth mentioning that camera position can also be set with [[setPos]], in which case it would be instant. With [[camSetPos]] it is possible to make smooth position transition in time, defined with [[camCommit]], which is required in this case. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetPos''' position</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera" or "seagull" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  position: [[Array]] - [[Position]] to set the object to </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[camSetPos]] [2300,1000,130];
_cam [[camCommit]] 10;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camSetRelPos]], [[setPos]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
